titleStmt.title: The sad suffering case of Major General Rob. Overton, prisoner in the Isle of Jersey, stated, and presented to the serious consideration of those who are either of a pious or publick spirit. By J.R.
titleStmt.author: J. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for L. Chapman at the Crown in Popes-Head-Ally,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 3d 1658 March. 3."; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
